alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Marion; Meigs; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:43AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradley, southeastern Sequatchie, southwestern Meigs, eastern Marion and Hamilton Counties through 730 AM EDT/630 AM CDT/... At 643 AM EDT/543 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lookout Mountain, or 9 miles west of Chattanooga, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Rossville, Walden, Lakesite, Ridgeside, South Cleveland and Fairmount. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
